Hello, world, my name is Sergei
There is something that I’d like to share
With you, good people - both young and old
Those you love and about whom you care 
I have riches that digits can’t measure 
Countless beautiful, meaningful words 
Which, combined, into rhymeful phrases
Can melt hearts and outshine even gold
If you’re looking for a unique present 
For your special significant other 
Or a friend, sister, brother, or parent 
Then you don’t need to search any further!
Simply write me about that person 
Memories, cherished moments, events
I will turn your story into an exclusive poem
Which only your dear ones will understand!

Those who say "age is just a number" - must be really smart
 Years keep passing, but you stay extremely young at heart
 You can act like a gentleman, a knight on a white horse
 And still remain the biggest hooligan on planet Earth!


You can cheer me up, then drive me crazy in no time
 You are more than a husband, you are my partner in crime
 Each day with you is an adventure for me and our 3 daughters
 And while we have you with us, there is nothing that can stop us!

When blood red leaves start covering the ground
 The numbers of degrees gets close to zero
 In fog, the morning view gets suddenly enshrouded
 And eerie becomes all the atmosphere


When sun rays show up early every morning
 But days become so short and nights get longer
 Winds howl and raindrops fall, affirming
 That summer’s gone and hidden in the yonder


When boots and hats get once again in fashion
 And swimsuits get replaced with coats and scarves
 Sunlight turns bleak, the sky starts looking ashen
 Until night falls and lights the sky with stars


That’s when I realize that autumn gives us
 So many reasons to sit by the fireplace
 To drink some tea and listen to wind’s whistles
 While waiting for the falling of snowflakes


Though every season has its special charm
 And there is no such thing as bad weather
 I’ll stay the happy person that I am
 Only if you and I remain together

I took you from the shelter as a puppy
 You were so young and full of energy
 My wife, kids and myself, we were so lucky
 To have such a member in our family


Being half-whippet, you were quite an athlete 
 You could maneuver faster than a squirrel
 No one could catch you, once you started running
 You always were too playful to stand still


And so we lived together, all these years
 It was us - humans, you, then Lily, too
 If someone asked what makes me really happy
 A fine example would be - having you


To see the happy facial expression
 Whenever you ‘’cleaned’’ empty yogurt cans
 Each time we sang and you ate b-day cupcakes
 While playing with kids, being hugged by them


While sleeping on my old couch, while swimming
 While playing fetch and fighting for the ball
 While walking a long distance, every evening
 Even when the weather was damn cold


I will never forget your and Lily’s prank
 When you got unleashed and got sprayed by a skunk
 The mixture of tomato juice with your and Lily’s fur
 Looked like a shredded body, smeared on a door


And even though you are no longer with us
 And those old times are gone and won’t return
 I hope that you are in a better place now
 My dearest friend, for whom I’ll always yearn
Just answer a short list of questions regarding a person you hold dear and remember - the more information you provide, the more detailed and interesting your poem will get!\n
There are many different presents one can give, but I will write one that truly stands out. Let\'s give your loved ones a SPECIAL treat!
Select one of the options to continue
If you don\'t know the answer to a certain question, you may press \"next\", without typing anything.

string-array.item: A sphere s/he is an expert in:
Personality traits that you appreciate:\n\nKindness, beauty, intuition, ability to listen, self criticism etc
Events and recollections:\n\nCircumstances you got to know each other under, a trip you\'ve been to together, help in your moment of need, a surprise made for you etc
Geographic location:\n\nFavorite cafe, bar, pub, etc / Countries, where the person has traveled / City on birth or where s/he living now
Outlook:\n\nIs that person shorter or taller that most other people? / Haircut / Dressing style / Beard / Mustache
Good or bad habits:\n\nLoves to help adult people / Loves to donate / Perfectionism at work / Smoking / Etc!
How has that person impacted you?
Similarities or differences between you and that person:\n\nOr, maybe, you would like to emphasize how you complement each other?

What would you like to wish to your dear person?\n\nThese wishes should be related to the event, be it health & wealth wishes for a b-day,healthy relationship, harmony and many children for a wedding day or a successful career for someone who just finished studying in a college etc
